SELECT product_id, pname, unit_price, description, manufacturer, category, unit_in_stock, condition, (SELECT A.ATTACH_NAME FROM ATTACH A WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = A.TID AND A.SEQ = 1) FILENAME, quantity FROM product p WHERE 1 = 1
AND pname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR description LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR manufacturer LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY product_id DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID, P.PNAME, P.UNIT_PRICE, P.DESCRIPTION, P.MANUFACTURER, P.CATEGORY, P.UNIT_IN_STOCK, P.CONDITION, P.QUANTITY, (SELECT A.ATTACH_NAME FROM ATTACH A WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = A.TID AND A.SEQ = 1) FILENAME FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(CART_ID, NAME, SHIPPING, COUNTRY, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS_NAME, ADDRESS_DETAIL, REGIST_DT) values(#{cartId},#{name},#{shippingDate},#{country},#{zipCode}, #{addressName},#{addressDetail},sysdate)
